title: Retirement Advisor: The Week (June 24-28) In Review
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we’ve explored whether retirement investors are too conservative; what we should invest in reading; Vanguard’s assessment of its own retirement-plan investors; and whether REITs are sufficiently similar to physical real estate. This podcast (6:41) suggests that if ideas are worth considering, then they’re worth reviewing, to wedge them a bit deeper into our active awareness. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
